005.name: RENOILT:
005.dialogue: I can't believe it. You are awake!

006.name: RENOILT:
006.dialogue: I apologize, I was sure you weren't going to make it.

007.name: RENOILT:
007.dialogue:
My name is Renoilt. I found you 
outside the city gates...

008.name: RENOILT:
008.dialogue:
...you had been attacked and close 
to death.

010.name: RENOILT:
010.dialogue: Your memory will return to you, I'm sure.

011.name: RENOILT:
011.dialogue:
I have bad news, though. While you 
were out...

012.name: RENOILT:
012.dialogue: a large tower, like a sword, fell from the sky...

013.name: RENOILT:
013.dialogue: and pierced the city. Now the creatures from inside...

014.name: RENOILT:
014.dialogue: have taken control of the city. You look like a capable fighter.

015.name: RENOILT:
015.dialogue: Please go to the Temple and see Elom, the Priest.

016.name: RENOILT:
016.dialogue: He will let you know how you can help.
